name: The Scrapper
description:
Scrap parts from bosses to upgrade your weapons. Choose from abilities, elements, weapon styles, and special attacks. However, your gun only fits one type of scrap, so makeshift wisely! The bosses change each playthrough, so you can discover new scrap combinations. 

Made for the Boss Rush Jam 2023.

This is the first game I made by myself! I had to submit something for the game jam, so it isn't quite finished. I plan to do one update at the end of March, which will provide better balancing, fix bugs, and add a new Final Boss (who may have taken the scraps you ignored along the way...)
